name: Mercure Kikuoka Golf Club

reviews.text: This is an out of the way hotel that seems to have frequent online deals. We were on a bike trip along the Mosel River and the value of this hotel enticed us. It is in a beautiful rural setting. The hotel is clean, modern and run by a professional staff. The restaurant was excellent. We sat out in the courtyard by the golf course and had a tranquil and delicious meal. Our family room was two-tiered. The kids were on the bottom floor while we had an open aired room at the top of the stairs. The indoor pool was awesome. We opted not to have the pricey breakfast and ate a bakery in a nearby town. I give five stars for the above reasons, but also because we got an amazing online deal.
reviews.title: Beautiful, Quiet Setting

reviews.text: after reading the very good tripadvisor and booking.com reviews I had great expectations of this hotel... maybe too high expectations :-) Hotel is located in the middle of a beautiful golf course in a very green and quit environment about 20km from Luxembourg city. Eating at the hotel restaurant is the only option... whe wanted the fresh pasta but were told that if we don't eat several dishes we should go to the bar. Bar food was ok / Kikuoka Burger was world class. Service is ok, although people have language difficulties they are very friendly.. Rooms are big and clean but 'cold' and boring design... almost no bathroom stuff, no mini bar - go to the soda machine- a lcd tv with the size of a computer screen and the bed isn't what you would expect in a 4* hotel. I was really disappointed when they told me in the leisure area that I had to pay an extra 8€ for the sauna ... this wasn't indicated on the website... pool was free and nice.
reviews.title: Wrong expectations I presume.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think this could be a nice hotel when you want to invite all of your friends to a wedding party... but with a reduced price of 89€ on a friday evening I'm sure you can find alternatives that are much much better.
reviews.title: excellent for a weekend stay

reviews.text: hotel is right on the golf course - good sized rooms - excellent sports facilities - lots of free parking - ideal for young families and golfers - the hotel is about 20 minutes from the centre of Luxembourg and 15 minutes from the airport -
reviews.title: overnight stopover

reviews.text: Used this hotel for an overnight stop on a long journey. Superior suite was clean and spacious and very comfortable. Staff very helpful, Bar food good.very dog friendly with excellent walks around the outside of the golf course.Breakfast pricing questionable.A few constructive points that would have made the stay even better;
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel and staff are most helpful - nothing too much trouble.

reviews.title: Nice remote place to stop off...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a one night stop over on our travels. We booked as the rate was very reasonable, and the hotel proved to be great value for money. It's out of the way though, so don't stay here and expect to be able to walk into town! We ate in the bar. The food was excellent but the pricing reflected the standard of the hotel, and there wasn't a massive choice on the bar menu. Would we stay here again. Yes.... as a one night stopover. (Would be great for golfers though!!)
reviews.title: One night stay

reviews.text: Wonderful specious hotel with good service.
reviews.title: Specious room, great breakfast, beautiful quiet location, great pool

reviews.title: VERY HELPFULL

reviews.text: I was having meeting close to Luxembourg city 15km away … more or less 20 mins drive to my meeting destination. So, I took advantage of a promotional rate and booked this hotel insteas of a central one. By the way … colleagues that preferred centrally located Luxembourg hotels, required more travel time due to morning traffic.
reviews.title: Excellent choice also for business travelers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was not disappointed since the rate was below my travel budget limit and the experience was a truly 4*. Spacious twin room for single person use, comfortable bed and free access to the wellness area with a moderate size swimming pool, jacuzzi and sauna. A relaxation refuge after the long tiresome business day. Water and Snack venting machine available. Breaksfast was really superb with freshly made orange juice and hot dishes. Excellent quality and dish-trays replenished immediately.
reviews.title: A relaxing and beautiful weekend at the Kikuoka Golf in Canach (LUX)
Great Country Escape, but...
reviews.text: It is practically the hotel for the Golf club, but since it is so close to Luxembourg and Trier, I will definitely select it again for tourism and business.
We booked here to take advantage of a "Bongo well-being break" voucher. On paper the place seemed inviting and had the amenities we sought.
reviews.title: Fine place to hide from the hustle and bustle

reviews.text: Our room was spacious but smelled of smoke (I forgot to specify non smoking) so I guess this is a plus for visitors who do.
reviews.title: review

aka: Mercure Kikuoka Golf Club Hotel Canach
description: The hotel is located in exceptional natural surroundings, just 20 minutes drive from the city of Luxembourg and features 59 comfortable rooms, 14 duplex rooms and two suites with elegant, refined decor, as well as 1 apartment with a kitchenette. The hotel also offers a traditional restaurant, two bars, five meeting rooms, an indoor pool, sauna, fitness centre, solarium and an 18 hole golf course.
